Reviews.Title: Great workhouse computer for business
Reviews.Author: Eagle Vision
Reviews.Content: The Dell Latitude line of notebooks are well built business machines.  The Latitudes and XPS lines are a tier higher than the entry-level Inspiron Series.The case is constructed of metal with plastic trim along the LCD monitor.  There are 4 USB ports which allow for a variety of peripherals to be attached such as portable hard drives.  There is a headphone and microphone jack and an outlet for a monitor.  The keyboard is comfortable to the touch.  In addition to the mousepad, there is a pointing stick with 2 buttons below the space key, allowing for either to control the cursor.  The 'spill proof' keyboard is one of the biggest assets (I have only spilled a drink on it once, where I just wiped off the keyboard without a problem in function).The WIFI capabilities is reliable and easy to set up.  The hard drive is quiet, as is the optical drive.  The strike zone hard drive is resistant to light drops.Performance of the notebook is excellent with the Dual Core processors.  This notebook easily handles virus scanning, working on a MS Office document, internet browser and listening to music without any problem.  The integrated graphics allows for basic games like Tiger Woods Golf, Mafia, NHL Hockey, the Godfather, for example.Battery life is very good for the 6 cell (about 4 hours).One of the greatest attractions that I have for this line of notebooks is the lack of 'bloatware' - unnecessary programs that are installed into your computer (trial programs, multiple internet service providers, advertisements, etc).Overall, with a spill resistant keyboard and drop zone hard drive, this notebook will take the daily knocks of the regular commuter.  This is no Panasonic Toughbook but it will survive your daily use.VERDICTHighly recommend this notebook.

Reviews.Title: Bargain Notebook
Reviews.Author: M. DiStasio "Hack"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the D620 for my daughter in college when her 2 yr old HP notebook died due to an overheating problem (long story).  After verifying that the D620 worked properly by connecting to the internet and installing XP SP 3, I moved over one of the RAM chips (for a total of 1.5 GB) and the harddrive from the HP.  I then installed Windows 7 and recovered her data files (I didn't really expect a college student to use the flash drives that I gave her for backups). Finally, I installed software including Office 7.  Throughout the process the D620 performed flawlessly.  I tested it by running DVDs, Office apps and videos over the internet (after I set up a wireless connection).  This is one fine notebook, very fast and with a good display.  Its only "short comings" are obvious from the specs, i.e., no web cam, no media slots and no DVD burner.  But these are clearly minor issues given the price.

Reviews.Title: glad I did this
Reviews.Author: nan
Reviews.Content: I didn't have a lot of money to spend on a computer and all of the chain stores that I had gone into to buy a computer did not have the service or the selection that I wanted.  I was hesitant to purchase a computer "on-line" but now I am glad that I did.  The computer was exactly what I wanted (Amazon gives you more information up front on what you are purchasing than any other place that I had tried), and I received it within two days.  I have not had one problem or complaint.  Well done.

Reviews.Title: A perfectly good laptop
Reviews.Author: Jake "Jake"
Reviews.Content: To read one of the other reviews one would think the reviewer is talking about a completely different machine. My family has two of these and we have experienced none of the problems that the other reviewer has mentioned. XP is a very stable platform and we'll see if Windows Seven will live up to the hype. As far as poor sound I wonder compared to what? I've had several different laptops and netbooks and they sound tinny compared to the D620. Besides, I hook the machine up to external powered speakers to listen to my music library.Let's face it. If Dell built poor quality equipment they wouldn't be in business as long as they have been.This is one great piece of equipment.DELL LATITUDE D620 14.1" WXGA

Reviews.Title: Used Dell Latitude D620 laptop
Reviews.Author: Ned "Ned"
Reviews.Content: I used the same laptop at work for the about the last 3 years, and it is a work horse. I can buy a brand new commercial laptop for couple hundred bucks more, but I wanted the reliability of the professional business laptop. I have to say this used business machine Laptop works well except for 3 problems: First, the battery only lasts 5 minutes, second, the DVD burner drive work sporadically (DVD door doesn't eject consistently, and it doesn't always detect the DVD or CD in it). Handed the laptop to my 11 year old daughter few weeks after purchase (Christmas gift), so I did not find out about these problems until 2 month after purchase. Contacted the seller, but the warrantee had expired after 30 days of purchase, so I have to buy a battery and drive on my own. Third thing, the XP pro operating system was loaded on the computer, but the recovery disks were not included; I hope the hard the hard drive doesn't crash sometime soon.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Tirra
Reviews.Content: This is a secondary laptop for me, but is nearly as nice as my primary(which I paid ALOT more money for, new).  I bought refurbished, and expected the unit to have a few blemishes, but it looks really great.  One tiny scratch on top that I can barely see. Otherwise, the laptop booted up as if it had just come out of the store.  The sellers dont garuntee the batteries, so I bought an extra one for it, but, come to find out, the battery the laptop came with is fine. Now I have two.  I also upgraded the laptops ram to 4gig.  Probly didnt need to, for what Ill use the laptop for, but the ram was cheap so there was no reason not to.  As far as how the computer works, its great.  Was nice and clean, and everything comes up fast. Im no computer expert, so I cant list a whole bunch of technical details for you, but I like the laptop very much.  Its everything it was advertised to be, attractive, and works very well for everything I use it for.UPDATE: Nearly two years after purchase, this laptop is still working wonderfully for me.  It has given me no issues or problems. I did buy a fan cooler to go underneath it but not because the unit was overheating.  I just like to be safe.

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Miguel Suarez
Reviews.Content: Excelent ! Easy of use,expandible mem ram ,dvd/burner,a fast intel core duo 2.0 procesor,a great 224mb grafics adapter , with the best windows xp pro for anything ,fast and secure.Upgradable to Win 7. Do recomend  buy this

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: forever PhD
Reviews.Content: Was easy to decide what I needed; the laptop arrived quickly, and is terrific. My son is using it; I just had a little bit of trouble getting the wireless set up, but managed to do it w/o help. Really useful, and lots of great stuff loaded on it. We will probably be buying another one for my husband soon!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Content: Still working, no problems for the price I paid! Very sturdy too. I am sticking with Dell from now on. I have bought two Dell items from Amazon, computer and laptop, and they still work fine. Bought HP products (elsewhere) that broke within a couple months.

Reviews.Title: OOPS!
Reviews.Author: shagwasue
Reviews.Content: My daughter recieved the computer and it would not work.  She sent it back to the company at HER expense of more than $60.  (that was not reimbrused).  After about 7 days the repaired comuter was returned to her.  It is now working fine.  My complaint is that it was delivered broken and she had to send it back at her expense.  We will not order from this company again.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful sursprise!
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: We needed an extra computer for our "pre-teens" and we were so pleased to see how great this was.  We thought we would have to fix little things on it but it was all ready to go.  My husband is an IT guy and he could not get over how well they had set it up!  GREAT BUY!

Reviews.Title: Runs Decent
Reviews.Author: Bunaca 1980
Reviews.Content: Have had little to no problem with product even though I did buy it used.  Everything runs great and had order had gotten here in a timley manner.  Product was in great shape for being used almost looked NEW.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great Service!
Reviews.Author: kuhnmom
Reviews.Content: The laptop's battery was dead, I called and they replaced it within the week!  Great Service!  Great Laptop!

Reviews.Title: 5 star review
Reviews.Author: Lucinda Barber
Reviews.Content: Had recently purchased a dell laptop used that was listed as used- acceptable condition. I received it as scheduled and was pleased with the condition of the laptop. 5 star services.....

Reviews.Title: Cheap Laptop
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Stiglich "Just a person"
Reviews.Content: I own this laptop more than one year, and I can tell you that after 6 months my battery died, I call Dell and they replaced it very fast (During warranty-Currently I am on my own risk!!!).  After that I had to replace Harddrive because also failed.These are cheap laptops but hardware will fail a lot...you need to be under a great warranty to be safe!

Reviews.Title: great machine--if you know what you're buying.
Reviews.Author: cactus
Reviews.Content: I.M.H.O.:if i were shopping for a d620, i would steer clear of the machines that are equipped with the nvidia gpu. this link explains the mess: [...]*edit* they wont let me leave a link here so i will tell you to google "dell nvidia lawsuit" and i'll leave the link in the comments section. m'kay?the machines with intel graphics are the ones i buy, and because of how this was handled, i have a pretty bad opinion of dell, hp and nvidia.as far as my machines??, i love 'em.mine have the 2.17ghz cpu and i'm running a ssd h.d. and this machine flies. it's really fast with linux mint13, too.the size is perfect, the frame is metal (lid too!), the keyboard is very close to thinkpad standards (i.m.o. the best), it runs cool (45c right now), and it looks great.mine doesn't have an sd card reader, but i put one in the expansion slot. it works great and looks factory. problem solved!the screen could be a little brighter, but i have a separate luminosity adjustment that tweaks that in linux. so there.conclusion?with the intel graphics, it's a darn fine machine. it's very fast for it's age and a pleasure to use.if the seller couldn't assure me as to which gpu the machine has, i would personally move on. just my opinion on the matter. research it yourself.*EDIT* i came back and added a star. remember though, with the nvidia graphics, this would be a zero star machine. however with the intel graphics it's a totally different ballgame. it would be a bad idea to buy one of these babies without knowing for sure which graphics controller it has. please be aware of this.*edit2* 5-26-13:still going. i took the ram up to 4gb and installed an even faster ssd. this machine still works great. i'm still running mint 13, but i upgraded the kernel to 3.9.3. linux doesn't clog up like windoze. i'll throw up a screenshot of my desktop to give you a peek.i hope my opinion helped!

Reviews.Title: Dell D620 Laptop
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: The Laptop was received quickly. It was packaged well. It works and the battery holds a charge well. The charger works well also. The only issue I have is the seller(Open Electronics) specifically, in all capital letters, said the screen had no dead pixels but it has several. They also said , in all capital letters that there are no bad sectors. Since the screen has dead pixels I am skeptical about the lack of bad sectors.Over all I am mostly satisfied with the purchase. The dead pixils are scattered and barely effect the image. The response time is fast also. The CD and DVD player functions work well.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Paulette Hibbert-Vitale
Reviews.Content: I just want to say I purchased this product from Tampa Laptops in March 2012 and loved it from it arrived.  You know how some laptop keys are kind of stiff and you can't type as fast or smooth as you like, well this one is superb.  I loved it so much that I went crazy a few weeks ago when my laptop crashed probably from a virus.  I emailed for assistance from the seller via Amazon and received a quick response.  The bottom line is I purchased a Dell Restore disk from the seller and I received the very best Technical Support I could have asked for.  James in their Technical Support Team, was patient, thorough, had a great speaking voice and he didn't quit until I got my laptop working again.  That's incredible support, the PC is amazing again, and I would 100% recommend this product to anyone who wants to buy a laptop and I would 100% recommend the seller.  I am very happy.  5 stars for the Laptop and 5 stars for the support - Thanks James.

Reviews.Title: simple,dependable, and reasonably priced
Reviews.Author: Eugene G. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Dell makes a sold working laptop that is very dependable,and is very reasonably priced for a previously leased used laptop!I have three or four of them and like the Windows XP Home and Pro operating systems.I'm sold on the older dell laptops!Gene

Reviews.Title: Refurb
Reviews.Author: Nat-Tay
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my nieces and they love it! It's a good home computer for them to play games, and browse the Internet. A good purchase overall.

Reviews.Title: A couple minor issues, but well worth the price
Reviews.Author: jerret
Reviews.Content: I had to update the OS when I got it in the mail, but other than that, this computer has been great. great price, quick delivery..outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Nearly flawless unit and fast, fast, fast!
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my dad to use and found that it works faster than the HP laptop I use every day (shhh...don't tell my laptop!). I don't think it has the separate number keypad, but he doesn't seems to mind.

Reviews.Title: Good deal @ $150
Reviews.Author: david brown
Reviews.Content: I needed a basic Windows laptop for an upcoming vacation.  I did not want Windows 8. As expected, The D620 accepted an old Paint Shop Pro 5 program I find very useful. That's not the case with current operating systems. They have much more going on than I need or care to pay for. This deal met all my expectations....no frills....it just works!!!

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: S.G.
Reviews.Content: I thought I was purchasing a laptop with Windows XP... It has linux software, which was stated.. I guess I didn't realize the difference.... The laptop is in overall great shape!

Reviews.Title: Yazzyjaz
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop and I am more than satisfied. I  have a story I want to share. I accidentally uninstalled my sound drive and all its components, Needless to say I was not happy with me. I tried different restore points and all kind of stuff until it hit me why not contact the seller and what a revelation that was. They contacted me the very next day which by the was a Sunday and sent me a link that enabled me to download everything back the way it was.So in conclusion, when I am ready to upgrade they are the ones I will be dealing with.I

Reviews.Title: My Dell D620 Laptop
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: I Love my laptop!! Paid a good price and I really do love it. I would do it all over again in a heart! If your looking for a great laptop I would recommend this one!

Reviews.Title: Good product, had to run scan to rid of viruses
Reviews.Author: Michael Ciaburri
Reviews.Content: Cleaned out viruses, computer in great shape. Works great.  Minor blemishes as advertised. Fast shipment. Overall happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: What an awesome deal
Reviews.Author: Cliff
Reviews.Content: Ive had two PCs in shop for a week and the estimated repairs (due to children stepping on screen) was more than I paid for this unit so price is competitive. Plus it was in "like new" condition. I'm a happy man!

Reviews.Title: Completely Satisfied
Reviews.Author: MS "MS"
Reviews.Content: Received my laptop very quick and it's in very good working condition. Seller is very cooperative as well. I uploaded my copy of Window 8 on it and it's working good as a family laptop. D620 is the best laptop Dell ever have.

Reviews.Title: dell laptop
Reviews.Author: Irene Travis
Reviews.Content: my brother inlaw has one liked it so ordered one perfect size fits in travel bag great easy to use for someone that never had one

Reviews.Title: Great Computer
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: Great Fast simple computer for the price. I would recommend it to anyone. It has wifi and plays cd/dvd and has many other features

Reviews.Title: blue screen
Reviews.Author: lynda margalit
Reviews.Content: After three months of use, the central processing unit failed; replacement would cost more than I payed for the laptop and as the service contract is only for a month, I would not purchase a rebuilt computer again.

Reviews.Title: Laptop
Reviews.Author: Ed J
Reviews.Content: The laptop is an excellent purchase. The well-built chassis ensures the longevity in life from external damage as opposed to experiences with "lighter" built laptops.

Reviews.Title: Top of the laptop
Reviews.Author: Karen Amrhein "Karen A."
Reviews.Content: This is a fine, inexpensive laptop.  My husband uses it for e-mail, web-surfing, writing, and watching DVDs / listening to CDs.  The wireless internet connection was easy to establish, the processing is quick, there's plenty of storage space, everything functions well..., in short, this is a winner!

Reviews.Title: Dell D620
Reviews.Author: ASISEEIT
Reviews.Content: This laptop was a great deal works fine so far although I did have to replace the battery that came with.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Angela Stinnett
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these laptops from Tampa-Laptops as Christmas presents for both of my girls. I had several questions I needed to ask before ordering so I e-mailed Tampa-Laptops and every time I received a quick response back that was very helpful. When the laptops arrived, I noticed the restore CD was not included in neither one of them and was suppose to be so I e-mailed again and within a few days, they had mailed me 2 restore CD's. My girls were excited on Christmas morning when they seen these. Not a day has gone by that they have not used their laptop. These laptops have been one of the best investments that I have made for my girls. I will definitely order from Tampa-Laptops again.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good deal.
Reviews.Author: Nikki J. Shefflette "Nikki is BeanzMom"
Reviews.Content: I was in need of another Laptop, and I found this one on Amazon at a really good price.  I received it very quickly and it was ready to go the minute I plugged it in.  Not much to the setup, either.  I did some personizing, but that was my preference.  I am happy with how the laptop functions and would buy the Dell again, if I needed to.

Reviews.Title: Happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: maureen caraballo
Reviews.Content: Had a problem with a key which was "sticking" & the vendor took care of it immediately to my total satisfaction

Reviews.Title: i was really good
Reviews.Author: kone
Reviews.Content: this laptop was beyond my expectation . i bought it as a present for a friend and he was so happy . moreover , it came faster than expected , in really good condition , it was simply wonderful

Reviews.Title: I love it !
Reviews.Author: Wesley Stark
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop for my former student, who bore and raised two children. One son has a very sick ... So I gave it to them and ... Laptop and beautiful, and inexpensive, and works great ... And now because of that we talk on Skype every day and enjoy the ... And all thanks to you and your shop!

Reviews.Title: Perfectly
Reviews.Author: David Betti
Reviews.Content: I received the laptop that i ordered and it works perfectly to my needs. I love it and enjoyed it.

Reviews.Title: Works Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for myself for a home laptop! It's clean, fast, and works great! I don't do anything fantastic with it, just pay bills, do taxes, check emails etc but for the price you sure can't beat it! A lot better deal than buying a new one for sure! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: I love Linux
Reviews.Content: I buy older machines like the D620, load them up with Linux and sell them.  While a dual core is tech from years past its still more then many consumers will ever use.  It will run Windows 7 and 8 as well.  A word of caution the wireless module in the D620 is a odd duck.  If you use a Debian based distro like Ubuntu the drivers are in the software center.  Be warned the ones suggested as you place Ubuntu or Zorin or Mint won't work.  Find the STA drivers for the 4311 chip set of the chipset in your computer.The unit I bought has a battery that lasts three hours.  This is a solid system!  You can always upgrade to a larger hard drive and or use a external drive.  Don't get me wrong this won't out perform a i5 or i7 laptop but a dual core will fit most casual users needs.  I can confirm that it works well with Ubuntu and Zorin.

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Ishmael Green
Reviews.Content: I actually have grown to love this laptop im using it right now to write this review. It handles anti virus programs well and defragmenting it barely slows down the computer. It has a decent graphics card not anything extrodinary but you can get away with some medium graphics capabilities. When i got the laptop i could tell that it was used a couple minor dinks and bruises. the wifi is great i can leave my house and go to my neighbors house and still pick up my wifi so thats a good thing overall if you want a cheap laptop to get you through your everyday internet needs than buy this one. If your a hardcore gamer thats gonna download a different game from steam everyday this isnt the laptop for you.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service!!!
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I purchase one of the refurbished DELL Latitude Laptops, D620 and the battery seemed low. It would charge, but I was only able to use it for approximately 40 minutes, then it would die. I emailed the distributor and told him that I thought refurbished meant a new battery, but then I read so many other reviews, of which most of them said the same to me, so I ordred a new battery from Amazon. BUT, the distributor had sent me a new battery also! I thought that was such wonderful customer service! I expected them to ignore me! Now I have 2 new batteries and my refurbished DELL is in great shape and I'd like to thank the distributor!

Reviews.Title: Great Machine
Reviews.Author: Joel Kitchen
Reviews.Content: Now, understanding this isn't a I7 machine, it has been great. Everything ran right off and no bloatware to deal with, no wifi problems. The hard drive that I got isn't 80 meg but 150, can't beat that. And I like XP. Sure, it isn't supported anymore, but then I don't do things (like go to places that are notorious for virus like porn sites, or open any extensions) that put me at risk (and just smile when people tell me about their problems with Windows 8). Looking around I note that to upgrade to 4gig is about $60, but at the moment there hasn't been a reason. The seller might do it for you with a call, haven't tried. Been having fun playing the original Mass Effect with no problems, mostly I just run internet, play audio books, and watch movies. Only 2 usb ports, but hey, it's cheap to get usb extensions. I'm really enjoying this machine at this price. I note that a lot of people write about the shipping container. Mine was just a USPS box, but it was well wrapped in bubble wrap, don't think there would have been any problems. I am considering getting another for my goddaughter. Finally, this isn't a problem for me but future buyers should note that there isn't a recovery disk, so if you die, you die. BACK UP :)

Reviews.Title: Great Service
Reviews.Author: Freckles
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with Tampa Laptops.  Ordered a Dell D620 for my son.  When it arrived he plugged it in and it worked right away.  But when the adapter cord accidently came unattached it would no longer boot up.Called Tampa Laptops and got OK to send it back and got a replacement within the week and this one works fine.  Great for the price!

Reviews.Title: Dell
Reviews.Author: Di
Reviews.Content: I had to return the first lap top to the company and they sent me another one so far its working good but its a little to soon to know for sure. i had a good experience with the company no problem returning it.

Reviews.Title: Dell laptop
Reviews.Author: Dog oWNER
Reviews.Content: The computer works great. Looks used but everything is functional, except the power brick. Got it all loaded up with the software I wanted only to find the battery life gone. After another $9.00 investment everything as good.

Reviews.Title: Good customer service follow up
Reviews.Author: Jill
Reviews.Content: Despite a customer service hiccup it seems this company went the extra step to do what's right.  Ethics count.  The lap top was exactly as described although dirty.  I spent about 35 minutes cleaning the dried coffee or cola then it was perfect!  I am still waiting for the final out come on the customer service part.  If it pans out I will increase my ratings.  As it is now, I am satisfied with the purchase.The customer service part has been fulfilled to my satisfaction.  I am pleased my opinion counted.

Reviews.Title: does not work
Reviews.Author: maribel
Reviews.Content: When i recived it was not keeping charge and some keys came off...it wont detect the internert...and cant use it

Reviews.Title: Well worth it if it works
Reviews.Author: emoses
Reviews.Content: Bought this item when it got to me it seemed to work fine.  2 weeks after the purchase buttons started sticking and working on and off.  Within 2 months several keys did not work at all.  The reason this one get 3 stars is everything else seems to work fine and the computer runs great.  You can always buy a USB keyboard and use that if the buttons start going haywire.

Reviews.Title: It heats up to quick
Reviews.Author: Blanca Estella Garcia "CONCERN PERSON"
Reviews.Content: I think Dell should really describe a refurbished item. I did not get the back up disk nor a warranty letter as other companies I have shopped with on amazon.com. I think it would be best to have an open communication with the buyers to want to purchase more and sense the company cares of people who purchase from them.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: John Rosalez
Reviews.Content: It is a good laptop for a good price.. Nothing Fancy but i wanted XP anyways.. CD burner works too

Reviews.Title: Good computer
Reviews.Author: Mark Church
Reviews.Content: Pretty fast. Great computer to do basic things like browse the net and save pictures. It also boots up fast.

Reviews.Title: Got more than I bargained for!
Reviews.Author: ahbjr
Reviews.Content: Ordered the D620 but received the D630 instead. I'll take the free upgrade!!!!!!! The laptop was well packaged and ready to go right out of the box. No issues whatsoever. The seller responded to my questions promptly and courteously prior to my ordering it.

Reviews.Title: nice laptop
Reviews.Author: barbara mccullum
Reviews.Content: good little laptop wish I could play sim 3 on it. It an older laptop but my family loves it for playing games except for the sims 3.

Reviews.Title: Runs Great
Reviews.Author: Dakota
Reviews.Content: Even though it is an old computer (2006), this computer still runs great. I bought a refurbished one from the seller, and it runs great. Everything was exactly how they said it would be except for it didn't come with Google Chrome. i am pretty satisfied. I've had it for over a month and haven't had any problems that weren't able to fixed quickly and easily. The lid locks shut, so it is easy for me to store it without worrying about it opening up and dirt getting on the screen.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful refurbished laptop
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: Bought this refurbished laptop for my husband who seems to go through them amazingly fast.  It was perfect.  He really enjoys it and it was a great value.  I highly recommend this seller for future purchases.

Reviews.Title: 4.7 stars
Reviews.Author: ihsiu
Reviews.Content: i appreciate the quick deliverary of the laptop and it's condition; the missing .3 star is due to the following:* no disc included as the image shows;* at first, the battery is pretty much next to dead; even the laptop could not detect its existence;  after contacting the seller, i was promised to have a replacement; it took more than a week to get it;* the MS Office is for corporative use only;in general, i'll give my recommendation; tnx, Mrs. Thrayton (or whoever behind).

Reviews.Title: Not bad for an old machine
Reviews.Author: Carroll Straus
Reviews.Content: I had to download about a zillion drivers to make this work--even the touchpad--and I thought I heard a scary heard drive noise once... but otherwise pretty much what I needed.

Reviews.Title: Terrible buy
Reviews.Author: Chris McLoughlin
Reviews.Content: I guess you get what you pay for. I hope that the the seller will take this piece of junk back or it will be a very expensive paper weight. The mother board is blown, the dual core barely works, it is constantly flashing and stalling. I think I can get another latitude on ebay.

Reviews.Title: Two Years of Happiness and Still Going. Planning to buy another.
Reviews.Author: CRW
Reviews.Content: I purchased this computer in December 2011; have been using it every day since.I can't believe I didn't review this computer sooner. I guess I was just so happy using it that I forgot. Was shopping for a cheap (but high quality) 2nd laptop and immediately thought of the dell 410 and 620. I own and use both. The 410 is lighter; the 620 has more features. In this case I am looking for more features, so the Dell 620 is a better choice. Also the 410 uses IDE disks which are getting harder to find; the 620 uses SATA, so disks are cheap and easy to find.So I started shopping on Amazon and noticed so many poor reviews. I can't image why. If you buy a used laptop, expect to replace the battery almost immediately and the hard drive sometime. They're givens and should be figured into the cost. In the case of the machine I bought in 2011, I'm still using both the hard disk and the battery that came with it. Thinking it is about time to replace the battery, but think I will try reconditioning it once more. Replacing a battery for a new laptop after two years is not unreasonable. Using a battery from a reconditioned computer for two years is awesome.One of the reasons I like the Dell 410 and 620 so much is that it is easy to buy extra hard disks (I put different operating systems on them) and slip them in and out. No need to jeopardize my work configuration in order to try something new. Just slip in an extra drive, copy the cloned backup image to it and experiment to my hearts content. If everything goes sideways I just slip my main work disk back in and pick up where I left off. Wanna play around with kali linux, mint, or the latest version of something else? Just slip in an extra disk and you're good to go.I'd happily purchase a reconditioned dell 620 (or 410) from any highly rated Amazon vendor. Check it out as soon as you get it to ensure you get the benefit of any warranty. Have fun. These are great computers.

Reviews.Title: Tired and well used PC
Reviews.Author: David Harkness
Reviews.Content: It is a tired, well used PC. The hard drive started making noise after 1 year. Then quit all together. Not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: fast, strong, satisfactory
Reviews.Author: Seonghoon Kim
Reviews.Content: It's working very well and fast. A clean and nicely built computer! Overall, its function is very satisfactory for its price. It's definitely recommendable to anybody who wants a computer good for your work and study.

Reviews.Title: Keyboard doesn't work too good
Reviews.Author: Edward53
Reviews.Content: It's a nice laptop but when I'm typing on the keyboard the letters I am typing will sometimes go back into the words that I have already typed. Here is an example of (ng aboutwhat I am talki). Is there anything I can do to to fix this? I really hope you can help me.

Reviews.Title: Pleased
Reviews.Author: Lisa A. Wahl "like412"
Reviews.Content: I was really pleased with how the computer works but the P button came off the keyboard. That is my only complaint.

Reviews.Title: Dell D620 Laptop Duo Core with Windows XP
Reviews.Author: C. Renee Wetherbee
Reviews.Content: they were quick to get it to me and it is everything that they said it was.  They have done a really good job with it.

Reviews.Title: Replacement
Reviews.Author: wileykiote60
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace my worn out one just like it,  Don't want to learn more new skills with a newer model

Reviews.Title: Good Deal.
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: Good replacement after my HP  Pavilion conked out... The capacitors in HP products especially there laptops tend to not last.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic seller, great computer
Reviews.Author: Happy Gurl
Reviews.Content: My traveling computer up and died on me in the middle of a trip. Such a bummer, I couldn't even get my old PC to boot! I did not want to buy a brands new computer because one day I am going to step into the light and buy an Apple but until then this seller was so helpful - over the phone and on a Sunday, he told me my old computer was too expensive to fix. He asked me what I needed to get back to work. I told him the software. He sold me this computer, loaded it with all the needed software and shipped it out to me with 2nd day delivery for $180.00 total! As soon as I received the computer, I downloaded all of my files from Carbonite ( another lifesaving investment) and was up and running in just over an hour. Can not heap enough praise on this seller... Many thanks

Reviews.Title: it was slow
Reviews.Author: PAUL L MCCALL
Reviews.Content: it messed up on me after I week the key board fell apart had to put a new one in and it was running slow when I got it and then it just shut down so I went and got me a new one

Reviews.Title: My rating of the Dell D620
Reviews.Author: Robert Farrenkopf
Reviews.Content: It was far better than I expected, and performed as if it were new.  Even the battery seemed new.  I would recommend EasyBuy Café, the source vendor, to anyone interested in a used computer.

Reviews.Title: best used purchase I've made
Reviews.Author: phil smith
Reviews.Content: I purchased product for my son and thought that a used computer made more sense. But not sure what quality of used product I would end up with and of course most important, if m my son would enjoy this computer.Computer arrived and some signs of visual wear, as to be expected from a used product. But it ran like new and my son seems to really enjoy! Would not hesitate to purchase again!

Reviews.Title: Better than expected!!!
Reviews.Author: TTBOY
Reviews.Content: Physical condition - 9/10It has everything exactly as described. I didn't need anything super fast...just needed it for internet. If I ever do need anything in the future...I will definitely order it from here. Very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: cheated...
Reviews.Author: edith
Reviews.Content: realmenmte I cheated with this machine, other than used was in poor condition CD device is damaged and you have to replace it, not at all what I expected ...

Reviews.Title: Great product and prompt service
Reviews.Author: Brianne Covington
Reviews.Content: This laptop functions better than I had expected; and when I came across a small problem, customer service was eager to help. The problem was fixed within minutes.

Reviews.Title: Had to Replace It, But Quick Turnaround
Reviews.Author: ROBERT A.
Reviews.Content: OK. The first one I received was defective but upon calling and speaking personally to Paul G.(PG Computers), he offered me an upgrade of more RAM or Win7. After I returned the bad unit, (yes I had to pay the postage), he sent me a new one with the upgrade.He even e-mailed me the tracking no.#.  It came quick (3 days).  As to the laptop, it's a sweet machine. WIFI, Buetooth, plenty o' 15" screen, USB ports,DVD RW!  OK, it's an off lease refurb, and it's probably about 6-7 years old, but it's still fast, runs good, looks new, and best of all, it was under $150.  Paul made the experience extremely rewarding, I'm looking into buying more stuff from his company. His prices and his service are that good.  Alan M.

Reviews.Title: Nice used laptop
Reviews.Author: Dominick T. Armentano
Reviews.Content: This was a nice used laptop that came loaded with Microsoft Office. It came promptly and is working very well.

Reviews.Title: got my top just in time
Reviews.Author: brianshaun
Reviews.Content: my product came right be4 the holiday and its designed to do exactly what i wanted i love it, duocore

Reviews.Title: Acutally, My Brother's Laptop
Reviews.Author: Brigit M Sanderson
Reviews.Content: There were many other places with computers that were listed as better quality, but this company had the best rating of all of them.  A major part of what I look for is satisfaction from other customers.  This company had it and had a better description of their product.  They also shipped it in a timely manner.  The laptop was being purchased at my brother's request.  He has stated that he is extremely pleased with the product and that it meets all his needs.  You cannot ask for any more than that.  I would definitely buy from them again.

Reviews.Title: good computer, low price
Reviews.Author: Larry John Faultner
Reviews.Content: it runs good, fills my wife's essential needs for school, and the price was very low. Overall good product. My only complaint is that it gets really hot when its running. I'd recommend it to anyone who needs a basic laptop.

Reviews.Title: refurbished lap top amazon buy
Reviews.Author: barb shepardson
Reviews.Content: its okay..  has cross over issues with  some programs that i need for work. also is very heavy, old school

Reviews.Title: Great shape.
Reviews.Author: Tiffany Chapman
Reviews.Content: It was in great shape, just had to get microsoft officefor it other than that it was wonderful....I still use it today.

Reviews.Title: i love it!
Reviews.Author: J. Enlow
Reviews.Content: 4 usb ports, locking lid, fast, clean, what else could you want?  i love w- xp.  that is all i buy!

Reviews.Title: Best Used Laptop I have ever owned.
Reviews.Author: babawawa
Reviews.Content: It works like a new laptop.  It is fast and I can do all my work without any problems. The price was perfect and it was delivered in record time. I look forward to buying from this seller again.  Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: JGA
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a family member whose old one was stolen. This is the best we could afford. SInce they only use it for word processing and web the speed and RAM limitations were not really an issue. It came in great shape and worked as advertised. At the time we bought it you couldn't beat this machine for the price.

Reviews.Title: wow I am happy
Reviews.Author: gaar101
Reviews.Content: I am very happy , it got here fast and all there ,,, but for a back up disk.  I thought all new or used would have a disk with it... hope I can find oneThank you

Reviews.Title: THis equipmente have problems with the battery
Reviews.Author: Lenin Lora
Reviews.Content: THis equipmente have problems with the battery, only 10 minutes, we need buy another battery.3 stars of 5 .

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: On the second try this company stepped up with a replacement and upgrades that were useable. The product is as expected with a clean case, minimal software and useable speed based on the price. The company does very well is taking care of customer satisfation.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Condition
Reviews.Author: fruitofthewomb
Reviews.Content: The computer arrived in excellent condition/working order. It connected to our Wifi right away and my husband is pleased with it. He is writing a book on it. I recommend this computer.

Reviews.Title: very neat
Reviews.Author: johnramsey
Reviews.Content: works well and has good speed it works well with a wireless mouse and doesn't take up too much space

Reviews.Title: lap top
Reviews.Author: Robert Curran
Reviews.Content: seems it doesn't hold a charge. not a biggie for us, but could be, and not what they said about it.

Reviews.Title: Not quite what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Rosalind M. Irvine "Lextownroz"
Reviews.Content: I received this in a timely manner, but the back light in the monitor was out when I turned it on for the first time.  When I called to let them know they told me I had to send to get it fixed and I had to pay to send. I decided at that time just to return because I'm not quite sure if I was going to keep it. So I just returned it, which I had to pay for. Just because they didn't provide a return label and I had to pay for it I would not order from them again. However they were very courteous when contacted and gave me no problem to return.

Reviews.Title: laptop- XP
Reviews.Author: K C Koester
Reviews.Content: Needed a laptop with Windows XP and I got what I needed.  Thanks for all your help.  will buy again

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Restoration
Reviews.Author: StrickC4
Reviews.Content: Absolutely flawless, beautiful feel, look, form follows function. So functional, and yet so aesthetic. Everything is above par on this laptop, so ergonimcally design and refurbished.

Reviews.Title: D620 laptop, used
Reviews.Author: sh
Reviews.Content: Excellent laptop at an excellent price.  Has more memory than  I need and is as functionally  good as any I've owned.  Thank you Amazon  You have yet to disappoint me.

Reviews.Title: It's a great catch
Reviews.Author: JosieFIFI
Reviews.Content: For the price, it's a great catch.  I was able to use this Windows XP PC to run an HP scanner which doesn't work on my Windows 7 PC.  It's a good backup PC to watch movies on as well as connecting to the internet to watch online movies and etc.  The only draw back is that sometimes the wireless internet signal is lost/disconnect temporarily.  It has wired internet connection so no worry there!!!

Reviews.Title: Dell laptop
Reviews.Author: Virginia Hassell
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband first computer. Really is a windows 7 and bumped up memory. The title isn't right but when you read their description it is right. Happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: Great Investment
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Bizzell
Reviews.Content: I brought this iteam for my husband for christmas.Lets say.. He still has it in his lap! I myself will need to get one since my faimly has laptops.i love my playbook though be still would like a laptop. Best money can buy.

Reviews.Title: Everything is.great so far!
Reviews.Author: jesswhite22
Reviews.Content: I received my lap top in less than 2.weeksnand it is in great condition with the exception of a few tiny scratches on the cover. Wifi has connectednwithout a problem. If you plan on using it battery only sometimes I recommend ordereing a new one when u purchase this laptop. Mme would not turn on unless it was plugged in no matter how long I charged it so save some money on extra shipping and buy the battery at the same time.  It is very lightweight also. Ive had it for a month so I hope t continues to be a great find as it was a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Dell lap top
Reviews.Author: Chancy D Hill Sr.
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a good lap top for my son,and i searched around and I got this really great deal on this lap top,It works great,it fast and very user friendly!

Reviews.Title: dated, might have been good years ago
Reviews.Author: Paul A. Spangler
Reviews.Content: Frustrated with how quickly this died on me.  Bought this refurbished at a low price.  I got what I paid for or I would have given this just one star.  Buy it cheap and don't expect it to last another year.

Reviews.Title: Great price and great quality
Reviews.Author: SaneOne "Grandma-to-be"
Reviews.Content: My larger Dell laptop and my little Dell Latitude Notebook both died within weeks of each other.  Mother boards.  Too expensive to fix especially given the age and condition of the computers.  I also have a Mac, but wanted to continue to manage my photos and videos on a pc.  Didn't want to learn new O/S, etc., and this one came with 7 / XP.  Looks like new.  Runs quieter than my old ones.  Great price.  Not sure I will ever buy new again, when refurbished is so good and so inexpensive.  P.S.  My apologies to the potential buyer who questioned me as to how many USB ports this has.  I said 2 on the back.  Oops!  There are 2 more on the right side, for a total of 4.

Reviews.Title: Great Computer for the Money
Reviews.Author: Kentucky62
Reviews.Content: We needed an extra laptop around the office for web access and powerpoint.  We recieved the Dell and it was exactly as described.  There are a few minor scratchs, but overall the computer was in great shape.  If you don't need all the latest gadgets or horsepower, this is a great alternative.  I would order again!

Reviews.Title: Customer Service earned these stars!
Reviews.Author: D. Caine
Reviews.Content: We bought this laptop reconditioned from Jeremy's Laptops here on Amazon.  The laptop is just fine and serves its purpose -- it was a Christmas gift to our teenage daughter who is aspiring to be a writer.  What impressed me here was the customer service we received.  After receiving the laptop, we had a little problem with it, so I posted a question to the seller through the Amazon site and received, not only a response, but a personal phone call from Jeremy --- on the same day that I posted the question!  Jeremy was very easy to work with and clearly puts customer service at the top of his list :)  Did I mention that phone call he made to us was while he was on vacation during Christmas?  I would most definitely purchase from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Dell for christmas
Reviews.Author: Austinarbors07
Reviews.Content: Christmas gift for my grandson. Purchased 5 days before Christmas, got here in time for Christmas morning. Great computer, happy grandson.

Reviews.Title: I like Dell
Reviews.Author: Polo
Reviews.Content: Good product (used) but Discount 18 the company i purchased it from was a little ify. It took a while but they finally sent a hard drive that would not crash every day.

Reviews.Title: A solid working product whose price you can't beat!
Reviews.Author: T P
Reviews.Content: The product came on time, in fact before expected. Well packaged ready to go. I had no major issues with the product. I was persuaded to purchase this particular model after listening to the reviews of those who already bought it. I am quite satisfied particularly considering the price. I have high speed internet and sometimes it would go off line therefore I would never use it to day trade but a simple restart or click repair quickly solves the problem.

Reviews.Title: Sent it back
Reviews.Author: Miller "dearkeeper"
Reviews.Content: This computer was returned because there was a problem with the monitor part of it.  Shipping was great and did no damage.  It was in the computer.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: leslie
Reviews.Content: the unit shipped as scheduled, no extra damage other than reported, the user installed the right programs and it worked fine

Reviews.Title: fits and works
Reviews.Author: chris schneider
Reviews.Content: it fit my needs and works. all i need. no complaints. i went with this one cause you get what you pay for. not cheap but not a spendy new one.

Reviews.Title: refurbished laptop
Reviews.Author: AD Richardson
Reviews.Content: Works wonderfully and was received ahead of the estimated shipping date. Made a 12 year olds Christmas. Very few blemishes and new software installed. Was a breeze to set up.

Reviews.Title: Laptop
Reviews.Author: Nancy Bateman NB
Reviews.Content: Well,I like Dell products. Especially their LapTops I think they're wonderfulAnd I would buy another as soon as I can afford one

Reviews.Title: good and affordable
Reviews.Author: Ash
Reviews.Content: It 's like new. Once I had problem with it .I sent it back to the company and they fix it in no time and sent it back to me. Excellent company

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: PSU Mountain Man
Reviews.Content: I have had my D620 for 6+yrs now and it has stood the test of time.  Used it through  4yrs. of college and I still use it today.  I have a little faster CPU than the one listed but you can not go wrong with this D620.  I purchased this when it first came out and it was pricey.  I like quality things and I spent an arm and a leg, even with my University discount. Lets just say I paid what a Mac Book Pro goes for today customized.  This is still a top 100 pc on Amazon years after it came out.  How many PC's can keep up with that?

Reviews.Title: h
Reviews.Author: Camalee Hall
Reviews.Content: seemed to be as explained. Nice laptop for the money. Most things used from amazon seem to be worth getting

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: april wilson
Reviews.Content: My son loves the laptop and it goes everywhere with him.  he is always on it and I only had to add a couple of programs for him for writing and gaming.

Reviews.Title: Works Great So far
Reviews.Author: Perry
Reviews.Content: Needed an inexpensive laptop and this fit the bill.  It works great and does exactly what I need it to.

Reviews.Title: Know How to Measure Screen Size First
Reviews.Author: cathy
Reviews.Content: Nothing against the actual product yet, (It works great), I was hoping to find a larger screened laptop for the price.  My mistake.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Brendan Usen
Reviews.Content: I like this product size and durability.  Even though it is Win XP, it is better than Vista.  It is great for a student and very portable.

Reviews.Title: laptop
Reviews.Author: John G. Stegman
Reviews.Content: worked right out of the box.  everything as advertised.  good speed for day to day functions. loaded with windows xp.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Cheri L. Lepage
Reviews.Content: It does everything I need for it to do.  I can now get on the Internet when my husband is on our computer.

Reviews.Title: Good job
Reviews.Author: manuel
Reviews.Content: I just got this laptop and it works perfectly fine, I am pleased and I would recommend them to people.

Reviews.Title: D620
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: This computer was shipped fast. I got the D620 with Windows 7 pre loaded. All is working as expected. Cool!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: miss marily
Reviews.Content: this is my first laptop.i bought it used ,at a very good price.it has never let me down.its not fancy,but works great.

Reviews.Title: update on previous rating!
Reviews.Author: modelmia
Reviews.Content: I  previously posted a review and rated this product very poorly. I purchased this computer for my ten year old daughter because she did well on her first report card. When we received the computer it was defective and I wanted to return the item. I submitted my request through Amazon and my request went unanswered (or so I thought). Today, I received a response (a personal phone call) from the manager of the company and I'm happy to report this issue is being resolved. Apparently, there was some miscommunication going on among all parties involved however, I'm told the company will send my child another computer better than the one I originally ordered at no additional cost. I will follow up with an additional update once this transaction has occurred to give a more accurate rating on the product. Thanks Alan of  Kenneth Westview for taking care of this issue!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Machine, Awesome Deal
Reviews.Author: stevestehr
Reviews.Content: I bought this refurbished unit from Discount18, and it was shipped quickly and packaged well.  The unit was good to go when I turned it on, and is performing like a champ.  I wish I would have known before I bought my last laptop that such a fine machine could be purchased for about $180.  It is solidly built, and runs very well.  I am immensely pleased, and recommend this machine highly.

Reviews.Title: great laptop
Reviews.Author: robert gomberg
Reviews.Content: laptop came exactly as described and was perfect for my needs.  it was actually in better shape than i thought it would be for an older operating system.  thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great value for the money!
Reviews.Author: Debbie M Watson
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this refurbished computer.  It has everything our EMS group needs to report runs and take training required to keep up our volunteer ambulance service, at a price that a volunteer group can afford.  Thank you for keeping this out of the landfill by touching it up.

Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Received the Dell D620 Laptop Duo Core with windows 7.  I was pleasantly surprised that it was 7 instead of XP.  The computer is like new and has all the features advertised.  I've been using for about 3 weeks now it works great! Terrific buy.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my grandson
Reviews.Author: Tnrodgers
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my grandson for his birthday. It arrived before schedule which was great. He is thrilled with his laptop and we can now stay in contact via instant messages and Facebook. He lives too far a way and I never get to see him so it is great that we can stay in contact through the internet.

Reviews.Title: Dell D620 Laptop Duo Core with WIndows XP
Reviews.Author: AV
Reviews.Content: The product came in excellent shape and had everything all ready for use of another. The past owner pretty much did everything for the next person to have easy access to it.

Reviews.Title: Great workhorse
Reviews.Author: Timothy O'mara
Reviews.Content: I had this for over two years and still going.  Battery life sucks but I use a plug-in charger.  Wi-fi has decent range around the house.  Plays dvds and cds well enough. If I had to buy another I would go this route again since buying new and paying hundreds for the same things doesn't make sense to me anymore.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Mimi
Reviews.Content: This is a simple computer; it does not have a web cam or any other convenient features you would find on a pricier machine. Because my intent was to simply use this for school work, I did not care that it did not have those features. I’m dissatisfied with this computer mainly because I have not been able to download MS suite to do my work, wireless connection goes out every so often while browsing the internet and customer service from the sell or dell is horrible. I contacted Dell who directed me to the seller. Contacted the seller and never got a response. Needless to say I have purchased a much better computer. It’s twice the price, but has all the bells and whistles…So that piece of junk (Dell D620) is in my closet collecting dust. Take my advice and invest the extra cash to get something much better…

Reviews.Title: Faulty battery and dirty
Reviews.Author: Timbukto
Reviews.Content: From the reviews I thought I would try a refurbished laptop and decided to purchase from Quality Masters. I received the unit with a defective battery that will not hold any charge. The battery compartment was very dirty and did not look as though it had been opened in a long time. I expected a refurbished laptop which would be used but cleaned up, but was disappointed with what I received especially as the battery was 100% dead and would not charge.I requested to return the unit and have received a return mailing label which I have to pay the postage? The unit is defective and I have to pay postage?I will see what happens when the unit is returned to Quality Masters to see if they refund me promptly and then update this review.

Reviews.Title: Bad Company to Purchase From
Reviews.Author: CJinColorado
Reviews.Content: They sent me the laptop with the BIOS password set and it had a burned out cpu fan.... not easy to replace. I emailed them to let them know and they didn't care that I had a bad experience. Would not buy from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Refurb laptop
Reviews.Author: Michael T Eden
Reviews.Content: Wi Fi would not work when it arrived.  Was told it would cost more to fix it than it was worth.

Reviews.Title: It doesn't work!!
Reviews.Author: rosedz69
Reviews.Content: I had it for just 2 weeks and the motherboard crashed. I'm not spending $300 to fix it.. what a total ripoff!!!

Reviews.Title: It's just OK.
Reviews.Author: Mr R A Vasichek
Reviews.Content: It's just OK. A used pc so I did not expect much and did not get much. It's just OK.

Reviews.Title: Dell Lap Top
Reviews.Author: michael henrikson
Reviews.Content: it is good for what it is I bought for my 11 year old she is very Happy.The seller was promt.

Reviews.Title: bad computer
Reviews.Author: Karen Miller
Reviews.Content: had blown out speakers & cd player didn't work was told it had just natural wear and tear on it and that there was slight discoloration on cover.

Reviews.Title: came broke have to use duck tape to hold battery in
Reviews.Author: Paul Jay Clark
Reviews.Content: First Every time you pick it up the Battery falls out have to use Duck Tape. Iv paid 600.00 to keep it running in the few months iv had it Intgernet will not stay up it is worse than the comuputer I used in the 90s Im done with Amazon you sent me a blue ray player that i still cant use3 then never sent me the webcam i paid for you suck Dell D620 Laptop Duo Core with Windows XP

Reviews.Title: Works great for the price....
Reviews.Author: Lori M Welch
Reviews.Content: Everything was as it was promised... it runs great and does the job.  We are very pleased with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: Life saver
Reviews.Author: Charles Martin
Reviews.Content: Use it everyday, a real life saver when forced to work with older software and programs...Good product works as advertised and good people to deal with...Could not be happier with it

Reviews.Title: Okay folks, these computers are 7+ years old
Reviews.Author: Erik H. Reppen
Reviews.Content: Why are they in the top 100 on the best seller list?The last time I saw one of these Latitudes, I worked at an advertising agency where we sent them back on leases that ended after 2 years because we didn't think they'd hold up well beyond that (they actually held up better than the Macs that also went back after 2 years), but refurbished or not, 7 years on any laptop is like 10 years on a Yugo). They run XP. Microsoft doesn't even support that anymore. They were reasonably solid machines at the time, but these things have been kicking around for a loooonnngg time.If your budget is 150 or less, I suppose you could do worse but I'd focus on finding a cheap desktop instead. It will last longer and the technology will likely be a bit more up to date. These were solid laptops in 2006ish but they're still laptops. They've rarely been built to last more than 3-4 years.

Reviews.Title: Dell D620 laptop
Reviews.Author: charles seagraves "Charles S Seagraves"
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these and has been a very durable computer.  I like the fact I can always find parts for it.I upgraded the memory and hard drive and bought the items here on Amazon at a great price.  Highly Recommend.How to Make Money Selling Computer Parts Online

Reviews.Title: kenneth WestView
Reviews.Author: tc007
Reviews.Content: Yes I would like to commend this company. I ordered a dell 620 which was in very good condition. But the 620 didn't meet my expectations, as I am moving to Belize in a few months and need more out of my computer. Well after talking to a representative there, they are taking the 620 back refunding my money, which I am applying back to the 630..I don't understand how anyone could not rate these folks 5 stars...thank you once again Kenneth and the kindness you and your reps.have shown me..T.L.Clark ....

Reviews.Title: Dinosaur
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: This was a piece of junk.  I replaced with Samsung Tablet.  The underside got very hot within minutes of powering up and the battery could not hold a charge longer than 15 minutes

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: jennifer mensch
Reviews.Content: you can't use the laptop unless it is plugged into the wall. the person said they just replaced it but if they did i shouldn't have to leave it plugged in. it is also really slow and takes forever to load websites, the person said it was fast. i will not be ordering off here again.

Reviews.Title: Big disaster
Reviews.Author: Renetta McClee
Reviews.Content: I just received this item, yesterday, and after anxiously awaiting its arrival...I wish I had saved my money and put it on a better laptop. I know you get what you pay for but I would've tolerated almost any other minor problem but the screen being messed up. From the time I took it out of the box to just now, the screen would show all these lines up and down it unless you pressed down on it with your thumb. As soon as you removed your thumb, it would do the same thing, making it impossible for you to type or move the cursor. The only time I could type is when I held the corner of the screen with my thumb, which is ridiculous! I am planning to contact the seller on Monday and see if I can arrange to ship this "thing"back to them and get a refund. I would accept a laptop in much better shape in exchange for this one but I don't trust that they will send one any better.

Reviews.Title: Dell D620 laptop
Reviews.Author: marcus hastings
Reviews.Content: I like it.Next time I'll get a full laptop not a tablet.I like them better can do more fore what i want to do later.thxs

Reviews.Title: did not meet my expectations
Reviews.Author: Glen Howard
Reviews.Content: did not meet my expectations. gPurchasing the product through amazon I expected to at leas:Receive the product that I purchased: I Received a Dell 610 LatitudeAndBe able to turn the product on to see if it worked: The laptop I received, Dell 610, did not have a power supply with it.Immediately, returned the product to the package it arrived in, taped it up, and returned the Dell 610.

Reviews.Title: Not a review- just a question
Reviews.Author: S.Rogers
Reviews.Content: I used to have a windows xp when they came out. Will this computer fully load programs meant for windows xp? I have backyard baseball 2005 that wont work on my windows 7. Its meant for the xp so will it work on this dell laptop? Thanks

Reviews.Title: Not so great on this one
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: I bought this Dell 620 Laptop Duo Core in February and  the mother board went out on July 5th.  What a bummer.  I will not use this company again, wish I could write a great review, in fact this is the first bad review I have had to write ever.

Reviews.Title: Broken Laptop on Arrival
Reviews.Author: A. Maldonado "Al"
Reviews.Content: I purchase this laptop based on the overview reviews - positive feedback - for my niece. I purchased the product from J and J computing and the laptop was not working properly. The product description stated refurbish but not quite right. When the laptop arrived it was turned on but nothing booted up not a good sign. Laptop was turned off and then restarted and work good. The following day same problem. I received a refund but I had to pay for  postage to return a broken laptop. I recommend not to purchase from J and J computing.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely the worst internet buying experience ever
Reviews.Author: Richard M. Harley
Reviews.Content: The laptop locked up when I first booted it up to register Windows. Rebooted 3 times to allow registration to continue of Windows. Sent 3 emails, no reply. Finally got someone on the phone who promised a Fedex pickup, which never occurred. Called back and left 3 messages, and 2 more emails, no return of either. Very frustrated that Amazon allows this vendor and has no stake in helping to resolve the issue. Ebay would never allow this. I cannot even find a link to complain to Amazon about the vendor/issue. Ebay and Paypal would not allow this. Makes you rethink the whole Amazon system.

Reviews.Title: don't buy from this seller!
Reviews.Author: Becky Curry
Reviews.Content: The seller had put a devise on the key pad so that everything typed showed up on one of his computers. I had to have it totally revamped.costed me a small fortune

Reviews.Title: Dell D620 Laptop Duo Core with Windows XP
Reviews.Author: Thamas Jean Denis
Reviews.Content: I love because it almost bring new. It is a 14" window laptop which I can almost carry where ever I go.

Reviews.Title: It doesn't do what I bought it for.
Reviews.Author: Lori Stevens
Reviews.Content: My desk computer is older and some of my games won't play.  The laptop doesn't play them either so I can't do what I actually bought it for.

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: alexandra
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this computer....took a Chance and so glad I did.....works great....thank you ...w.recommend this product..Very happy with it

Reviews.Title: very poor
Reviews.Author: gayla
Reviews.Content: Thiz is very bed laptop. Its scam.just garbage. No one buy this. I send for my friend Australia. Now I'm feel so bed. He said this is trash. Second laptop no working. Please remove this laptop amazon in your site.i really trust amazon but this is my worse step I ordered this garbage one

Reviews.Title: Fraud!
Reviews.Author: G. E. Racin
Reviews.Content: Never got the computer!  No response to my 2 emails!  Its a scam I tell you, WATCH OUT for these sheisters!

Reviews.Title: Piece of garbage
Reviews.Author: Deimos "."
Reviews.Content: Even running an outdated OS like windows XP in 2009 this laptop under performs.  It takes a very long time to start up programs, long load times, long boot times, random freezes, hard drive problems after one year with further degraded performance, it's a cheap mess.  The laptop itself is very heavy and rugged but lugging that weight around to protect cheap unreliable hardware seems foolish to me.  The hard drive always requires at least 40% improvement on read times even right after a de-frag.  The track-pad stops working randomly and when using this laptop for work that can be a major problem and usually requires a restart.  Internet explorer crashes randomly on this machine but works fine on any other system I have , VM-Ware takes roughly 10-15 mins to load to a useable state on this laptop, the speakers are terrible, the usb ports require drivers to work properly and like most Dell systems I have used including the XPS the dvd-rom drive stops working and stops reading disc's after you install a few programs, rip music or change disc's a couple of times requiring yet another restart....the dvd rom icon even goes missing from my computer like you don't even have a dvd drive to begin with?!?!  Well I think I have covered everything and it's basically the whole damn computer. Over all this laptop is nothing but heavy, cheap, unreliable garbage.

Reviews.Title: bad quality control
Reviews.Author: mandrake
Reviews.Content: I returned this laptop because the audio was missing. I had bought about 20 DVDs and about 2 were defective, but because I bought so many, I went over the return time limit so I had to keep the disks. Anyway, I am never going to buy another item from Amazon. It just doesn't pay. Whatever I save, I lose due to bad quality control. I lost about $17.50 in return shipping charge.

Reviews.Title: The big deal offer
Reviews.Author: Anthony R. Lee
Reviews.Content: I not pass this up i had the to do it so i got it my first tech stuff in my whole life it has been a good thing for me it changed i can go moible siting at a coffee shop care free now i look inportant.
